summary_hu: A Bitcoin árfolyama jelentős csökkenésen ment keresztül, és a kriptovaluta közösség feszültséggel teli. Trump bejelentette, hogy Kevin Walsh-t szeretné a Fed elnökének, ami új aggodalmakat keltett a piacokon. A nemesfémek, különösen az arany és ezüst árfolyama szintén drámaian zuhant, ami jelzi az általános piaci pesszimizmust.
summary_en: Bitcoin's price has experienced a significant decline, causing tension within the cryptocurrency community. Trump announced his preference for Kevin Walsh as Fed chair, raising new concerns in the markets. Precious metals, particularly gold and silver, have also seen dramatic drops, indicating general market pessimism.
key_points_hu: Trump Kevin Walsh-t jelölte meg a Fed elnökének, amely új aggodalmakat vetett fel.
A nemesfémek árfolyama, különösen az arany és ezüst, jelentős mértékben csökkent.
key_points_en: Trump nominated Kevin Walsh as Fed chair, raising new concerns.
Precious metals' prices, especially gold and silver, significantly declined.
main_topics: Fed Chair Nomination and Market Reactions

title: Are We Pivoting To Metals? Tune in Live!
transcript: What a surprise, guys. Yeah, you can't drop that on ice in the beginning of the stream. Really? It threw me off my game, man. >> Uh Oxford row coach has got problems of his own as well. You're probably the best uh best place person to deal with any flooding in Oxford. I don't know why you're complaining. It's everyone else in Oxford that's that that's got problems. Um, uh, guys rocking man boobs. >> Central banks are looking to stock up on an asset that can, you know, that that is more neutral than the US dollar. >> Exactly. Exactly. >> I'm going to let you know that I sold pretty much all of my crypto and moved it into metals and I'm going to explain why right now. >> Well, thanks for the heads up there, Lewis. I mean, that would have been great to know. It seems like that pivot to the bullion duro has gone off swimmingly.
summary_hu: A beszélgetés középpontjában a befektetési irányváltás áll a kriptovalutákról az arany és más fémek felé. A központi bankok egyre inkább olyan eszközöket keresnek, amelyek semlegesebbek a dollárnál. A narrátor elmondja, hogy a kriptovalutáit eladta, és fémekbe fektette a pénzét, amit a piaci helyzet indokolttá tesz.
summary_en: The discussion focuses on a shift in investments from cryptocurrencies to gold and other metals. Central banks are increasingly seeking assets that are more neutral than the dollar. The narrator mentions selling his cryptocurrencies and moving his funds into metals, a move justified by current market conditions.
key_points_hu: A központi bankok a dollárnál semlegesebb eszközöket keresnek.
A narrátor eladta a kriptovalutáit, és fémekbe fektette.
A piaci környezet indokolja az arany és fémek irányába történő elmozdulást.
key_points_en: Central banks are looking for assets that are more neutral than the dollar.
The narrator sold his cryptocurrencies and invested in metals.
The market conditions justify the shift towards gold and metals.
